languages.text: {n}Маражай облизывает губы. Потом ухмыляется.{/n} "Это было наказанием. Один из моих рейдов был... недостаточно успешен, и Иремерисс приказала Тервантьясу насильно имплантировать знание уродливого языка мон-кай мне в разум — якобы чтобы я мог приносить хоть какую-то пользу кабалу, лично уговаривая скот зайти в клетку. Пять дней под ментальным выжигателем в главной зале шпиля на радость всей свите. Я вывернул все суставы, когда бился в кандалах от боли, но с радостью перенес бы это еще раз, чтобы эту дрянь истравили у меня из головы".

{n}Marazhai licks his lips. Then he smirks.{/n} "It was a punishment. One of my raids was... not as successful as it should have been, and Yremeryss ordered Tervantias to forcibly implant the knowledge of the repulsive mon-keigh language into my mind — supposedly so that I could at least benefit the Kabal by coaxing the mon-keigh into their cages. Five days I spent under a cerebral burner in the spire's main hall, to the delight of Yremeryss's entourage. I dislocated every joint struggling in agony against my shackles — but I would endure it all again to expel this poison from my head."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай облизывает губы. Потом ухмыляется.{/n} "Это было наказанием. Один из моих рейдов был... недостаточно успешен, и Иремерисс приказала Тервантьясу насильно имплантировать знание уродливого языка мон-кай мне в разум — якобы чтобы я мог приносить хоть какую-то пользу кабалу, лично уговаривая скот зайти в клетку. languages.text: {n}Marazhai se relame y sonríe, burlón.{/n} «Fue un castigo. Una de mis incursiones fue... menos exitosa de lo que debía e Yremeryss ordenó a Tervantias que me implantara el conocimiento del asqueroso idioma mon-keigh en la mente. Dijo que así por lo menos podría ayudar a la Kábala guiando a los mon-keigh a sus jaulas. Pasé cinco días bajo un quemador cerebral en el salón central de la torre, para deleite de los seguidores de Yremeryss. Mientras me debatía contra los grilletes, conseguí dislocar todas mis articulaciones... y lo volvería a hacer de buen grado si con ello pudiera expulsar esta inmundicia de mi cabeza».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai licks his lips. Then he smirks.{/n} "It was a punishment. One of my raids was... not as successful as it should have been, and Yremeryss ordered Tervantias to forcibly implant the knowledge of the repulsive mon-keigh language into my mind — supposedly so that I could at least benefit the Kabal by coaxing the mon-keigh into their cages. Five days I spent under a cerebral burner in the spire's main hall, to the delight of Yremeryss's entourage. I dislocated every joint struggling in agony against my shackles — but I would endure it all again to expel this poison from my head."

Dijo que así por lo menos podría ayudar a la Kábala guiando a los mon-keigh a sus jaulas. Pasé cinco días bajo un quemador cerebral en el salón central de la torre, para deleite de los seguidores de Yremeryss. Mientras me debatía contra los grilletes, conseguí dislocar todas mis articulaciones... y lo volvería a hacer de buen grado si con ello pudiera expulsar esta inmundicia de mi cabeza».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋舔了舔嘴唇，随后自嘲地笑了。{/n}“这是惩罚，有一次突袭……我失败了，于是伊芮梅莉斯命令特万提亚斯，将猴子恶心的语言强行植入进我的大脑，说这样我至少可以把猴子们骗进笼子里，以此造福阴谋团。整整五天，我被锁在尖塔大厅里，忍受着雕脑机的灼烧，可把伊芮梅莉斯的随从开心坏了。在那痛苦之中，我拼命地扯着枷锁，把所有的关节都扯脱臼了。不过，要是能把脑子里这些毒液驱逐出去，哪怕现在让我再忍受那样的痛苦，我也愿意。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai licks his lips. Then he smirks.{/n} "It was a punishment. One of my raids was... not as successful as it should have been, and Yremeryss ordered Tervantias to forcibly implant the knowledge of the repulsive mon-keigh language into my mind — supposedly so that I could at least benefit the Kabal by coaxing the mon-keigh into their cages. Five days I spent under a cerebral burner in the spire's main hall, to the delight of Yremeryss's entourage. I dislocated every joint struggling in agony against my shackles — but I would endure it all again to expel this poison from my head."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは唇をなめ、ニヤリと笑う。{/n}「罰だったのさ。俺が取り仕切った襲撃が…うまく行かなくてな。イレメリスはテルヴァンティアスに、忌々しいモン＝ケイの言語の知識を俺のアタマに強制的に植え付けるよう命じたんだ。おそらく俺がモン＝ケイをなだめて檻に入れることで、少なからず陰謀団の役に立つとでも考えたんだろう。俺は5日間、尖塔のメインホールにあるセレブラルバーナーの下で過ごしてレメリスの側近たちを喜ばせた。全身の関節を脱臼し、足かせに苦しんで俺はもがく羽目になった。だが、この毒を頭ら追い出すことができるってのなら、もう一度あの苦痛に耐えてやる」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai licks his lips. Then he smirks.{/n} "It was a punishment. One of my raids was... not as successful as it should have been, and Yremeryss ordered Tervantias to forcibly implant the knowledge of the repulsive mon-keigh language into my mind — supposedly so that I could at least benefit the Kabal by coaxing the mon-keigh into their cages. Five days I spent under a cerebral burner in the spire's main hall, to the delight of Yremeryss's entourage. I dislocated every joint struggling in agony against my shackles — but I would endure it all again to expel this poison from my head."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは唇をなめ、ニヤリと笑う。{/n}「罰だったのさ。俺が取り仕切った襲撃が…うまく行かなくてな。イレメリスはテルヴァンティアスに、忌々しいモン＝ケイの言語の知識を俺のアタマに強制的に植え付けるよう命じたんだ。おそらく俺がモン＝ケイをなだめて檻に入れることで、少なからず陰謀団の役に立つとでも考えたんだろう。俺は5日間、尖塔のメインホールにあるセレブラルバーナーの下で過ごしてレメリスの側近たちを喜ばせた。全身の関節を脱臼し、足かせに苦しんで俺はもがく羽目になった。だが、この毒を頭ら追い出すことができるってのなら、もう一度あの苦痛に耐えてやる」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se passe la langue sur les lèvres avant d'esquisser un sourire en coin.{/n} « C'était une punition. L'un de mes raids n'a pas été... aussi fructueux qu'escompté, et Yremeryss a ordonné à Tervantias d'implanter de force dans mon esprit la connaissance de la langue honnie des mon-keigh, sous prétexte que je pourrais au moins me rendre utile à la Kabale en embobinant nos proies. J'ai passé cinq jours prisonnier du carcan d'un graveur cérébral, dans la grand-salle de la flèche, pour le plus grand plaisir de l'entourage de cette mégère. Je me suis déboîté toutes les articulations à force de me débattre... Pour autant, je serais prêt à recommencer si cela pouvait me permettre d'extraire ce poison impie de ma cervelle. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai licks his lips. Then he smirks.{/n} "It was a punishment. One of my raids was... not as successful as it should have been, and Yremeryss ordered Tervantias to forcibly implant the knowledge of the repulsive mon-keigh language into my mind — supposedly so that I could at least benefit the Kabal by coaxing the mon-keigh into their cages. Five days I spent under a cerebral burner in the spire's main hall, to the delight of Yremeryss's entourage. I dislocated every joint struggling in agony against my shackles — but I would endure it all again to expel this poison from my head."

L'un de mes raids n'a pas été... aussi fructueux qu'escompté, et Yremeryss a ordonné à Tervantias d'implanter de force dans mon esprit la connaissance de la langue honnie des mon-keigh, sous prétexte que je pourrais au moins me rendre utile à la Kabale en embobinant nos proies. Je me suis déboîté toutes les articulations à force de me débattre... Pour autant, je serais prêt à recommencer si cela pouvait me permettre d'extraire ce poison impie de ma cervelle. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai leckt sich die Lippen. Dann grinst er.{/n} "Es war eine Strafe. Einer meiner Überfälle war ... nicht so erfolgreich, wie er hätte sein sollen, und Yremeryss hat Tervantias befohlen, das Wissen der widerwärtigen Sprache der Chem-Pan-Sey gewaltsam in meinen Verstand einzupflanzen. Angeblich, damit ich der Kabale zumindest nutzen kann, indem ich die Chem-Pan-Sey in ihre Käfige locke. Fünf Tage lang lag ich in der Haupthalle des Turms unter einem Cerebralbrenner, sehr zur Freude von Yremeryss' Gefolge. Ich habe mir jedes einzelne Gelenk ausgekugelt, als ich mich vor Qualen in meinen Fesseln gewunden habe, um mich zu befreien. Doch ich würde es alles erneut erdulden, um dieses Gift aus meinem Kopf zu vertreiben."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai licks his lips. Then he smirks.{/n} "It was a punishment. One of my raids was... not as successful as it should have been, and Yremeryss ordered Tervantias to forcibly implant the knowledge of the repulsive mon-keigh language into my mind — supposedly so that I could at least benefit the Kabal by coaxing the mon-keigh into their cages. Five days I spent under a cerebral burner in the spire's main hall, to the delight of Yremeryss's entourage. I dislocated every joint struggling in agony against my shackles — but I would endure it all again to expel this poison from my head."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, dudaklarını yalıyor. Ardından sırıtıyor.{/n} "Cezaydı zaten. Baskınlarımdan biri... İstenen şekilde sonuçlanmayınca Yremeryss, Tervantias'a bu iğrenç mon-keigh dilinin bilgisini beynime işlemeyi emretti. En azından mon-keighleri kafese girmeye ikna edersin de Kabal'ın bir işine yararsın dedi. Kulenin ana salonunda, Yremeryss'in maiyetinin karşısında, beyin yazıcının altında beş gün geçirdim. Zincirlerimden kurtulacağım diye çırpınırken çıkmayan eklemim kalmadı ama bir daha gel, o zehri aklından sileceğiz deseler hiç düşünmeden giderim."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai licks his lips. Then he smirks.{/n} "It was a punishment. One of my raids was... not as successful as it should have been, and Yremeryss ordered Tervantias to forcibly implant the knowledge of the repulsive mon-keigh language into my mind — supposedly so that I could at least benefit the Kabal by coaxing the mon-keigh into their cages. Five days I spent under a cerebral burner in the spire's main hall, to the delight of Yremeryss's entourage. I dislocated every joint struggling in agony against my shackles — but I would endure it all again to expel this poison from my head."

İstenen şekilde sonuçlanmayınca Yremeryss, Tervantias'a bu iğrenç mon-keigh dilinin bilgisini beynime işlemeyi emretti. En azından mon-keighleri kafese girmeye ikna edersin de Kabal'ın bir işine yararsın, dedi. Kulenin ana salonunda, Yremeryss'in maiyetinin karşısında, beyin yazıcının altında beş gün geçirdim. Zincirlerimden kurtulacağım diye çırpınırken çıkmayan eklemim kalmadı ama bir daha gel, o zehri aklından sileceğiz deseler hiç düşünmeden giderim."
